MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting L25 postcode area of Liverpool,  affecting properties in Malton Road and the surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:16PM. Our emergency response team are on their way to site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 1:30AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:21PM on 1st March 2021
